short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Script to intercept unwanted keys and automate single key deletion by condition.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension intercepts backspace and delete keys and rendering them user for http://10.92.13.110/videocoding/ site. This was created to lessen the keystrokes of the user and improve productivity.
